name: MongoDB Enterprise V-81843
title: MongoDB must integrate with an organization-level authentication/access mechanism
script:
authorization="authorization"
checkfile="/etc/mongod.conf"
if [ -f $checkfile ]
then
    log=$(grep -i "${authorization}" "${checkfile}" | grep -Ev '#' | grep -i "enabled")

    if [ -z "$log" ]
    then
       echo "Can't find $authorization or it is not set to enabled within $checkfile"
       exit 1
    else
       echo "$authorization exist within $checkfile"
       exit 0
    fi
    else
       echo "$checkfile does not exist"
       exit 1
    fi
